content: As preparation for the definition of the Tutte polynomial I have some PRs with some helper lemmas about finsum_mem:
#23926 adds lemmas in Mathlib/Algebra/BigOperators/Finprod.lean related to products/sums over the powerset ùí´ s when we add or remove an element of s.
#24336 adds pulling out multiplication by a constant, it adds the analogues of finsum_mul and mul_finsum.

I think @Eric Wieser and @Bhavik Mehta had a look at the first PR already. At some point I added the content of the second PR to the first one, but since there was a merge conflict only affecting the content of the second PR, I have split it off to its own PR.
